title: Bug 21192UnsatisfiedLinkError thrown when pressing a hardware key
description: Using SWT 2047 on PocketPC I get an UnsatisfiedLinkError on OS.VkKeyScanW(S)Sin ControlWMKEYDOWN. OS.VkKeyScanW is not part of the 2047 SWT DLL forPocketPC (I believe the function does not exist on this platform).If I comment the snippet below for PocketPC it works fine:for (int i=0; i<ACCENTS.length; i++) {int value = OS.VkKeyScan (ACCENTS [i]);if ((value & 0xFF) == wParam && (value & 0x600) == 0x600) {return null;}}
